subject: FIXED: Admin routes changed to admin/ops/* — pull DEVL
body:
Hey Quinn,

Good find on the Azure route conflict.

## Fix Applied

Changed to 3-segment routes (same pattern as admin/backup/*):

| Old Route | New Route |
|-----------|----------|
| /api/admin/data-health | /api/admin/ops/data-health |
| /api/admin/user-activity | /api/admin/ops/user-activity |

## Why This Works

Azure reserves 2-segment admin/* routes but allows 3-segment routes:
- `admin/backup/mongodb` ✅ (3 segments, works)
- `admin/user-activity` ❌ (2 segments, conflicts)
- `admin/ops/user-activity` ✅ (3 segments, works)

## Next Steps

1. Pull DEVL: `git pull origin DEVL`
2. Restart func
3. Update CALOPS frontend to use new routes

Swagger also updated.

— Fulton
